ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 96
ygData.msgSnippet: Why do you all act like this? I try to help, but you decline it. If what you want is for me to truly leave with my information, then that is what I will do. I
ygData.messageBody:
Why do you all act like this? I try to help, but you decline it. If what you
want is for me to truly leave with my information, then that is what I will
do. I will leave the choice up to you. I'm trying to apologize by helping,
but you seem to want to be stubborn, and keep insulting me, saying all I'm
out here to do is brag, when in fact I'm trying to do the opposite. What I
have to do could easily be done by a level 1 shaman barbarian. I just want
to check it out for myself first and return with a report, if you all hate
me so much that you wouldn't even take direct information from me because
you think I want to just brag about it, then I wil quietly leave you all
with out another letter. But like I said, it's yur choice, you can accept it
or decline it.

>The fact that your not willing to reveal what it is you have to do, so that
>others on the list, some of whom are in the high level 40s can do this only
>suggests that your simply back to troll some more.
>
>So why don't you just kindly leave?
>
>Oh wait, you want to troll a bunch of messages so then you can come back in
>a couple days and say something like, "Well, I found the important thing,
>but since you all were unkind to me I won't reveal it, but this time its
>your alls faults, not mine."
>
>Gimme a break and just leave...
>
>Rotgut
